website_summaries.verdict: Great video projection quality with the option to upscale non-4K content such as movies and TV shows.
pros: Easy to set up and use
Stands out for its almost guaranteed excellent video quality
Features bright, bold colours and impressive brightness
cons: Lacks some of the more advanced features similar projectors offer

website_summaries.verdict: You won’t find a more versatile 4K HDR projector for enjoying your favorite films and games at their best.
pros: Smooth, crisp, and detailed true-to-life 4K HDR UHD picture
Clear contrast between light and dark images
cons: A 4K projector this nice was bound to be a pricy one

customer_reviews.title: Massive
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. I am a happy man. Its huge so prepare for divorce when you bolt it into your lounge
customer_reviews.author: Mr B.

customer_reviews.title: and the light was good
customer_reviews.text: On my wish list for a while, but I couldn't resist the deal of the day offer. Random thoughts : It's a huge object, be prepared. Incredibly bright. The 4k enhancement is most noticeable on youtube UHD demos, and netflix UHD. 4k discs look better than their blu ray versions, but not astoundingly so. However standard blu rays look fabulous. Brilliant optical set up, supremely tweakable. Whisper quiet, depending on settings used. Gives out a fair bit of heat if you are sitting close to it (as I do). Superb remote, back lit, feels good in the hand. Worth the upgrade from a standard 1080 projector. I've had three previous projectors, all by Optoma, but this beats them all!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hopkinson

customer_reviews.title: Large size of unit but brilliant picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Faux 4k is indistinguishable compared to "real" 4k in person. The projector is enjoyable viewing during daylight hours, but comes I to it's full glory at night or in light controlled conditions. The unit itself is very well made, but Very large and Very heavy. Make sure you account for this when deciding its location. The lens shift function gives quite a lot of versatility in that regard. But be aware its lack of Bluetooth will mean you'll need to run at least a cable to the front sound bar or buy a Bluetooth transmitter
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Emanuele Ciurleo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp image but poor blacks.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp image with reasonable contrast but blacks are not great.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Kipper

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, very large
customer_reviews.text: Too big for tabletop use, had issues with Apple TV 4K as would not work with HDR even though stated would. No issues with 4K Blu-ray. Fairly quiet and good picture when fed right source. Had to return as mostly use Apple TV 4K.
customer_reviews.author: navbear

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Very nice projector, great mounting flexibility with generous lens shift. The picture out of the box is wonderful without any calibration. It’s quite big, so make sure you have adequate space for shelf installation. There is an annoying high pitch noise coming from the projector when displaying 4k @ 60Hz... the noise goes away at 50Hz so this is what I’m using by default on my apple tv 4k for menus. Blacks are not so black, especially the upper and lower bands on cinema formats, but it’s not so bad after all... i guess that’s why the UB line exists and commands a higher price. All in all it’s a great projector for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Damiano

customer_reviews.title: Super bright, sharp and quite
customer_reviews.text: Picture is stunning . My third projector and this one is far beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Shr3k

customer_reviews.title: What a step up!  Everything looks good...even the news!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a bit of a monster, bigger than the tw3200 it replaced. Its dead silent, just gets on with the job, and what a job it does! Superb picture quality, lots of freedom with regard to picture brightness etc. It does a great job of upscaling the picture too. All in all, Im very pleased with it and wouldnt hesitate to recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Home cinema at its best.
customer_reviews.text: It’s BIG and beautiful. Bought on Amazon for a bargain price. So easy to set up and simple to operate. Picture quality outstanding. Played planet earth 2 ‘4K Ultra HD’. Detail is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Ifeelgood

customer_reviews.title: Big But Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 4k picture and easy to set up with the motorised lens shift. It's also very quite in eco mode. Love it. Beware though, it's even bigger than you think its gonna be!
customer_reviews.author: G. W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money - great picture!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic projector for the money - much improved over my previous Panasonic projector - very happy indeed!!
customer_reviews.author: TotalMetal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clarity
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up great quality and amazing to watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Deegan

customer_reviews.title: a big beast, but well worth it if you have the space!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat taken aback by the size (why it's 4 rather than 5 stars) when it arrived, but careful placement under a coffee table, and with thanks to the very adjustable lens shift, that was all soon forgotten about when we saw the stunning picture. It my not be true 4k, but I'd say spend more on something like this that's a high quality 1080p projector (with pseudo-4k), then maybe move to true 4k in a few years time!
customer_reviews.author: DH

product_meta.title: Epson EH-TW7400 3LCD, 4K Pro UHD Super Resolution, 2400 Lumens, 300 Inch Display, Motorised Optics, Home Cinema Projector - White
product_meta.description:
Style Name:EH-TW7400Epson’s EH-TW7400 4K PRO-UHD Projector brings the movie theatre experience home with the impressive 4K PRO-UHD display combined with LCD technology, Full HD, UHD BD and HDR support. Delivers an exceptionally high 200,000:1 contrast ratio allowing you to see incredibly defined detail even in the shadows. With an equally high white and colour light output of 2600 lumens, the 3LCD technology lets you enjoy vivid colours and the HDR support gives extra detail and depth, offering natural, rich colours. Incredibly long lamp life of approx. 5000 hours (in Eco mode) minimises lamp replacements. Installation is simple and precise with the motorised optics such as powered 2.1x optical zoom, powered focus and a powered lens shift of ±96.3 percent vertical and ±47.1 percent horizontal. Always view films in the correct aspect ratio by storing your 10 favourite formats. Compatible with CalMAN software, the projector also provides professional ISF calibration tools.


PACKAGE CONTENTS
Epson’s EH-TW7400 HDMI cable clamp Power cable Remote control with background light includes batteries Users manual

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.

BOX CONTAINS
HDMI Cable Clamp
Main unit
Power cable
Remote control with background light
incl. batteries
User's Manual Set

See more
feature_bullets: Crisp, Clear Images: The Epson EH-TW7400 projector offers crisp, clear images with 4K-enhancement, 3LCD technology, Full HD, UHD BD and HDR support
Brilliant Lamp Life: Watch a movie a day for 7 years with the EH-TW7400’s 5000 hours of lamp life when in Eco mode: Noise level: Normal: 31 dB (A) - economy: 20 dB (A)
Motorised Optics: Installation is simple and accurate with the help of motorised optics including powered zoom, focus and lens shift (Vertical ±96.3 Percent and horizontal ±47.1 Percent)
High Contrast Ratio: See shadows in defined detail with the high 200,000:1 contrast ratio
Smooth: Motion pictures are sharp and smooth, even in the fastest action scenes with frame interpolation and detail enhancement
Includes two year UK warranty on the projector and one year/1000 hours warranty on the light source
